description: The Emersion Fleece is your cure for cabin fever. A sweatshirt so soft it feels like you could melt into its Tencel® velvety smooth fleece, but with just enough technical chops to layer underneath your rain jacket for a much-needed breath of fresh air. Stretchy, breathable, quick drying, and rated UPF 30 to protect your skin from harmful UV rays, the Emersion Fleece is a home office staple.
name: Outdoor Research Emersion Fleece Crew - Mens
